Package com.glamdring.greenZenith.exceptions.application.user.constants

Enum Class UserExceptions

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<UserExceptions>
com.glamdring.greenZenith.exceptions.application.user.constants.UserExceptions
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<UserExceptions>, Constable
public enum UserExceptions extends Enum<UserExceptions>
Contains predefined exception messages to indicate a special type of exception when caused by an interaction of the User.
Since:
0.1
Version:
2.0.0

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    ACCOUNT_ACCESS
    The password given does not match the one in the database, negating the access to the account.
    AGE_BIGGER
    The age entered by the User is not within the valid range.
    AGE_SMALLER
    The age entered by the User is not within the valid range.
    CART
    The format of the User's password does not follow the established format,
    EMAIL
    The email utilized for establishing a User couldn't be found within the database.
    FORMAT_EMAIL
    The format of the User's email does not follow the established format,
    FORMAT_PASSWORD
    The format of the User's password does not follow the established format,
    GZDBCONNECTION
    The connection to the database utilizng the GZDBConnector failed to construct.
    INEXISTANT
    The ID utilized for establishing a User couldn't be found within the database.
    LENGTH_USERNAME
    The length of the User's username does not follow the established restrictions.
    LOCATION
    The location entered by the User cannot be resolved.
    PASSWORD_MATCHES
    The old password does not match the user's current password for providing validity to update the user's data.
    PASSWORD_NULL
    The password given is of null value and cannot be utilized.
    PICTURE
    The picture entered by the User cannot be saved.
    PICTURE_HANDLER
    The picture entered by the User cannot be saved.
    PLANT_DUPLICATE
    The the name of this plant is a duplicate of another one.
    PLANT_ID
    The ID of the plant does not match the provided criteria for identity validation.
    PLANTS
    The list of the user's plants cannot be resolved.
    PRODUCTS
    The list of the user's products cannot be resolved.
